title: An Act relative to fairness in home sales

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Scanlon of North Attleborough, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1989) of Adam J. Scanlon and Samantha Montaño relative to discrimination of certain homebuyers.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
